plot: A trio of high school kids accidentally resurrect Solomon Grundy, reviving him more powerful than ever but with no memories of his past. Dr. Fate, Amazo, Aquaman, and Shayera assist League regulars stopping his rampage.

A trio of school kids resurrect Solomon Grundy in order to get back at some bullies, but the ritual doesn't go as planned when Grundy causes a rampage in the city. Elsewhere, Shayera is struggling to find balance over her life after resigning from the team and for being branded a traitor during her former people's invasion on Earth. Inza gives Shayera some uplifting advice. The Justice League is unable to stop Solomon Grundy's rampage. Shayera, Dr. Fate, Amazo, and Aquaman arrive to save everyone on the collapsing bridge. Shayera is able to save a young girl and her mother from a falling car, she reunites with her ex-boyfriend John, who has been dating Vixen. Shayera finds Solomon Grundy and she uses her Nth mace to put him down. Everyone starts to badger Shayera with questions, but Green Lantern and Superman defend their former teammate. The mother and daughter arrive to thank Shayera for saving them. Shayera decides to rejoin her team again after learning that Superman was willing to give her a second chance for stopping the Thanagarians.—dawsonpersi
